title: More Math Practice
goal: Practice MEX and order of operations.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

MEX review:

li pa su'i re du li ci = ?
li mu pi'i re du li ? = ?

(Answers: 1 + 2 = 3, 5 × 2 = 10)

New Material (5-7 min)

New Vocabulary

Lojban Place Structure English
jibri x1 is a job of person x2 job/employment

Order of Operations

In Lojban MEX, operations are evaluated left to right by default:

li pa su'i re pi'i ci du li so

(1 + 2) × 3 = 9

But standard math uses multiplication first. To match standard math, use grouping.

Larger Numbers

Number Lojban
10 pano
15 pamu
23 reci
100 panono

Complex Equations

li pano su'i mu du li pamu

10 + 5 = 15

li reno vu'u mu du li pamu

20 − 5 = 15

li mu pi'i vo su'i re du li rere

(5 × 4) + 2 = 22 (left to right)

Key Point

MEX evaluates left to right. For complex math, parenthetical grouping exists but basic left-to-right is common.
sections.title: New Material (5-7 min)

sections.content:
Practice (4-5 min)

Exercise 1: Create 10 Equations

Write any 5 equations:

Example Answers
  1. li vo su'i xa du li pano
  2. li pano vu'u ci du li ze
  3. li re pi'i mu du li pano
  4. li pare fe'i ci du li vo
  5. li mu su'i mu su'i mu du li pamu

Exercise 2: Translate to Numbers

What do these equal?

  1. li ci pi'i ci =
  2. li pano su'i pano =
  3. li remu vu'u mu =
Answers
  1. 9
  2. 20
  3. 20

Exercise 3: Job Vocabulary

Translate:

  1. This is my job.
  2. I have a job.
  3. My job is good.
Answers
  1. ti jibri mi
  2. mi se jibri
  3. lo jibri pe mi cu xamgu

Conversation Challenge (1-2 min)

Do math aloud:

Solve and say:

  1. 7 + 8 = ? → li ze su'i bi du li pamu
  2. 6 × 7 = ? → li xa pi'i ze du li vore
  3. 100 − 50 = ? → li panono vu'u muno du li muno

Summary

You practiced more MEX with larger numbers and multiple operations.
